news.title: Free Webinar for Lawyers: Using ChatGPT and AI Solutions for Legal Marketing Content
news.description: Lawyers with our free Justia Connect membership are invited to join us for an upcoming Justia Webinar exploring the implications of ChatGPT and artificial intelligence for creating legal marketing content. Keep reading for more details.

news.title: Justia Free Resources: The Justia U.S. Supreme Court Center
news.description: The U.S. Supreme Court profoundly influences our society. To many, it is both familiar and opaque. In this post, we're exploring the newly redesigned Justia U.S. Supreme Court Center, a free resource shedding light on the highest tribunal in the nation.
